name: Massacre of the Innocents
description: Massacre of the Innocents; Amico Aspertini (Italian, 1474/1475 - 1552); Italy; about 1510 - 1520; Red and black chalk, with traces of brown ink, heightened with white heightening; 27.9 × 42.7 cm (11 × 16 13/16 in.); 97.GB.49; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Massacre of the Innocents
medium: Red and black chalk, with traces of brown ink, heightened with white heightening
